DOC.brief_summary: The present study design evaluate basal serum level anti-mullerian hormone ( AMH ) inhibin B early predictor ovarian response , implantation rate , pregnancy rate woman 38 year old old undergo IVF cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Anti-mullerian Hormone Levels Predictive IVF Outcomes Women Over 38 Years Old
DOC.detailed_description: Specifics aim : ) describe AMH inhibin level day 3 previous ART cycle ; b ) analyze association hormone level retrieve metaphase II oocytes quantity ; c ) analyze association hormone level quality embryo score ) analyze association hormone level number gestational sacs per transferred-embryo ( implantation rate ) ; e ) analyze association hormone level pregnancy rate ; f ) make prediction model pregnancy rate use multivariable regression analysis . Patient participation include sign consent additional tube blood draw regularly schedule blood draw . This blood use run study test ( AMH inhibin level ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women 38 year old old time initiate treatment 1 . Uterine disease : malformation , septum , submucosal myoma , endometrial polyp Advanced endometriosis endometrioma ( ) 2 . No uterus 3 . Single ovary
